field.name: product_id
field.domain: [('type','=', 'service'), ('x_medium', '=', parent.x_job_type), ('x_transport', '=', parent.transport), ('x_segment', '=', parent.direction),'|',('x_ocean_shipping', '=', parent.ocean_shipping), ('x_ocean_shipping', '=', parent.x_cb_type),'|',('x_land_shipping', '=', parent.x_cb_type), ('x_land_shipping', '=', parent.land_shipping),'|',('x_air_shipping', '=', parent.freight_air_shipping),('x_air_shipping', '=', parent.x_cb_type)]
